articles.title: Fuel pump prices reach new high, breach S$4 mark for the first time - TODAY
articles.description: SINGAPORE — Fuel pump prices reached a new high on Friday (June 3) to breach the S$4 mark on the back of the European Union’s decision to phase out Russian oil and expected growing demand from China amid its easing of Covid restrictions.
